T02D2117:156a-0: @156a ` // 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2117:156a-1: de nas s'a tstsha gdab pa ni /
T02D2117:156a-2: rus pa la las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis brab po //
T02D2117:156a-3: de nas lag pa rdo rje rtse gsum pa'i phyag
T02D2117:156a-4: rgya bcas la las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis byin
T02D2117:156a-5: gyis brlab / sa rin po che sna lnga'i phye mar bsam /
T02D2117:156a-6: de la dri sna tshogs pa sbyar ba'i chus sbrus shing brdung ngo //
T02D2117:156a-7: de la rin po che yang bdar ngo //
T02D2117:156a-8: de nas 'jim pa'i gong bu la rdo rje rtse
T02D2117:156a-9: gsum pa'i phyag rgyas reg ge byas la las thams
T02D2117:156a-10: cad pa'i sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas la
T02D2117:156a-11: rin po che'i gong bur gyur par bsam /
T02D2117:156a-12: las thams cad pa'i sngags kun la sbyar ro //
T02D2117:156a-15: 'debs pa thams cad thabs shes rab zung du 'brel 'bi 'bi zab pa /
T02D2117:156a-19: 'od zer gyi 'phro 'du byed pa sprul sku'i don no //
